pedigree.translation[0].definitions[0].d: the parents and other past family members of an animal or person, or an official written record of this
pedigree.translation[0].definitions[1].d: the history and achievements of something or someone, especially when they are good and should be admired
pedigree.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Founded in 1781, the school has an excellent pedigree.
pedigree.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a pedigree animal comes from a family that has been recorded for a long time and is considered to be of a very good breed
